繁體中文.title: 公路車尺寸建議工具

inseam: 從腳跟到恥骨聯合的垂直距離，使用硬板頂緊會陰量測
trunk: 從恥骨聯合至胸骨凹口（鎖骨中間凹陷）
forearm: 從肘關節（尺骨鷹嘴）到手掌中心或握把位置
arm: 從肩峰（肩膀最高點）到手掌中心或握把位置
thigh: 從股骨大轉子（髖側突出骨點）到膝關節中心
leg: 從膝關節中心到腳跟或內踝
sacrum: 從腳跟到胸骨上切跡（鎖骨交會處）
height: 從地面到頭頂的直立高度
shoulder: 左右肩峰（肩膀外側骨點）之間的距離
sitbone: 以壓痕方式測得兩坐骨突起間的水平距離

繁體中文.stack_ok: ✅ 相符，建議使用 {value} cm 墊圈
繁體中文.stack_fail: ❌ 差距太大，建議更換車架
繁體中文.reach_fit: ✅ 可用 {required} mm 龍頭，與預設 {default} mm 龍頭差 {diff} mm → 可使用預設龍頭
繁體中文.reach_unfit: ❌ 需要 {required} mm 龍頭，預設為 {default} mm → 建議使用{direction}龍頭或更換車架尺寸
繁體中文.shoulder_suggest: 建議把手寬度：{value} cm ±2 cm
繁體中文.support: ☕ 如果這個工具對你有幫助，歡迎請我喝杯咖啡：

English.title: Road Bike Fit Recommendation Tool

inseam: Vertical distance from heel to pubic bone using a firm object against crotch
trunk: From pubic bone to sternal notch (between collarbones)
forearm: From elbow (olecranon) to center of hand or handlebar grip
arm: From acromion (shoulder tip) to center of hand or handlebar grip
thigh: From greater trochanter (hip side bone) to knee joint center
leg: From knee joint center to heel or medial malleolus
sacrum: From heel to suprasternal notch (top of sternum)
height: Upright standing height from ground to top of head
shoulder: Distance between left and right acromion (shoulder tips)
sitbone: Horizontal distance between sit bones, measured via pressure marks

English.stack_fail: ❌ Too far off. Consider changing frame
English.reach_fit: ✅ Recommended {required} mm stem, difference from default {default} mm is {diff} mm → Default stem is acceptable
English.reach_unfit: ❌ Needs {required} mm stem, default is {default} mm → Consider a {direction} stem or changing frame size
English.support: ☕ If this tool helps you, consider buying me a coffee:
